meanings.definition: The process of manufacturing or constructing components of a structure in a factory or other manufacturing site, to be assembled on site.
meanings.sent1: The prefabrication of the walls made the construction of the house faster.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in the prefabrication of steel beams for buildings.
meanings.sent3: The prefabrication of the giant Lego pieces for the skyscraper was a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a prefabrication plant, assembling ideas into a coherent structure.
meanings.sent5: The prefabrication of the spaceship modules was like putting together a giant puzzle.
